summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Rally Dashboard application. All major features working correctly including setup page CRUD operations, overlay scenes with keyboard shortcuts, chroma key backgrounds, and localStorage persistence.

ui_bugs.issue: Click interception issues when selecting dropdown options

passed_tests: Setup page loads with all sections (chroma key selector, tabs)
Add pilot with name, picture URL, stream URL
Delete pilot functionality
Toggle pilot active/inactive status
Add stage functionality
Delete stage functionality
Time matrix - input times for pilot√óstage combinations
Chroma key selection (Green, Blue, Black, Custom hex)
Export configuration to JSON file
Navigate to overlay page via 'Go Live' button
Overlay page displays with selected chroma background color
Scene 1 (Live Stage) - displays active pilot streams in grid
Scene 2 (Timing Tower) - displays timing table + main stream
Scene 3 (Leaderboard) - displays overall standings table
Scene 4 (Pilot Focus) - displays single pilot focus with stats
Scene 5 (Split Comparison) - displays bar chart comparison
Keyboard shortcuts 1-5 switch between scenes
LocalStorage persistence - data survives page refresh
UI follows design guidelines - Barlow Condensed font, orange accents, dark theme
Form validation and error handling
Toast notifications for user feedback
